abstract: Cabinet council approves war profits tax bill
snippet: ROME, May 1--While European governrnents anxiously watched Italy's reaction to the British decision to route Mediterranean shipping around the Cape of Good Hope, Premier Mussolini this morning received United States Ambassador William Phillips....

headline.main: ITALY ASSURES U.S.; Phillips Sees Mussolini on Possible Ship Ban in Mediterranean BRITISH EXPLAIN DECISION Envoy Has a 'Cordial' Talk With Ciano--Press Silent on London's Move

lead_paragraph: ROME, May 1--While European governrnents anxiously watched Italy's reaction to the British decision to route Mediterranean shipping around the Cape of Good Hope, Premier Mussolini this morning received United States Ambassador William Phillips.
